title: Is government transparency good or bad? - Quora

response.answer_text: In a democracy it is essential! The government is supposed to be no more than the delegates of the people themselves, their “employees”. Can you imagine a business where you employed a bunch of people, paid their salaries but had no right whatsoever to check their work or see what they were spending their budget on? Without transparency, there is no democracy and the tail is wagging the dog.
